attributes.action: reinstate neil ankers to royal mail
attributes.additional_details:
Certain managers lied so neil would lose his job because neil was one of those people that knew the job and could do it with ease and they did not like him they accused neil of being under the influence of alcohol whilst on duty.

This is totally obsured as neil never drank alcohol whilst at work.

Neil as tried everything to get his job back now we need to help him please sign this position to help him
